comments.text:
Halal food SHOULD be banned, but not because it's muslim.

It should be banned because it's fucking inhumane. Seriously, go and try to 
watch someone slit an animal's throat, watch the animal suffer for 1-6 
minutes of asphyxiation, while people laugh at it and/or hoist it up by a 
leg in pain and/or kick blood in it's face.

You can end up in one of three camps after that, really, a) the people who 
are ok with it being legal because they don't care about untold suffering 
of sentient creatures, (worst, only supported by morons who think a 
fictional sky god cares that much about your burger) b) the people who it 
banned and the animals killed humanly, via a brain destroying shot to the 
head (better, second best, realistic option), c) the people who want it 
banned and don't eat animals, because we don't need animal flesh to survive 
(best, not realistic for the entire world at the moment)

Kosher should be banned too, they do the same damn thing but laugh at the 
animal in a different "prayer".﻿

comments.author: 13unner

comments.text:
1) "Ugh I was trying to be polite. But ultimately you're a case of 'you 
can't argue with stupid'."

Unforunately it's not me being the idiot between us. Your argument is I'm 
picking on halal and kosher for slaughters animals in a torturous way while 
conscious - originally, you deny evidence of people doing it, now you deny 
it occurs at all. Here is the wikipedia entry on halal and kosher. 
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_Islamic_and_Jewish_dietary_laws#Similarities. 
Here's a news article on the fact it occurs, and with growing and not 
shrinking frequency 
http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/home-news/growth-in-slaughter-of-nonstunned-animals-is-unacceptable-7715790.html. 
Here's halal advocates, a website supporting halal meats. 
http://halaladvocates.net/site/our-issues/stunning-animals/ They state 
little halal meat exists in north america (which MAY be true as there are 
far less muslims here then overseas, and I do only notice about 5% of the 
market near my location as selling meats labeled halal and kosher - but 
they back no facts or statistics and everything else I found was court 
cases striking down bannings on non-stunned animal slaughters as being a 
form of religious discrimination). Notice however at the end, where they 
SPECIFICALLY advocate that all muslims try to get all meats killed without 
stunning.

This is the issue here. You basically closed your eyes and yelled "No no no 
you're wrong they do stun animals!" when it is extremely evident that they 
do not. The reason I said go see the video is because it shows you how 
horrible a non-stunned slaughter is (Again, I'm personally against all 
forms of meat eating, but I believe that the worst forms should be banned 
while others should be only discouraged). Now. For yet another time. They 
DO keep animals unstunned. What the hell weird defence are you going to 
come up with next.

2) "if I can't explain to you why your logic is false then there's no point 
us talking."

Please. Please tell me how my logic that killing an animals while it's 
awake by bleeding it to death isn't a horrible way to kill the animal when 
we can knock it unconscious right away. Your entire disagreement with me 
was founded on your uneducated belief that halal meats are stunned - which 
by everything I see from all the laws specifically saying you don't need to 
stun halal meats and the fact that halal certification in most countries is 
only handed out if the animal is not stunned, makes no sense.

3) "Just try to lay off the discrimination by repeatedly mentioning halal 
and kosher over other kinds of slaughter,"

I'm being discriminatory in the same way saying "Murderers have killed 
people" is being discriminatory. Sure, I'm saying everyone who killed 
someone has killed someone, lumping everyone who's killed someone with 
everyone else who's killed someone. . . But yeah, it's a factual matter and 
not a discriminatory matter. I'd be opposed to none-religious people who 
slit their animals' throats while conscious too, as that's my objection to 
halal and kosher - not the praying over it (which is just insult to injury 
in my opinion). And since matter of fact statements aren't discriminatory, 
I'm therefor not being discriminatory.

4) "I shouldn't have to repeat myself but they now knock the animals 
unconscious before carrying out the slaughter,"

Actually, you should say it again. Reality needs to beat some sense into 
you a bit more, because you're obviously delusional on this subject matter.

Now watch you not read anything I said and scream about how I'm the idiot 
again.
comments.author: GADefence

comments.text:
+GADefence Ugh I was trying to be polite. But ultimately you're a case of 
'you can't argue with stupid'. You keep using the same bad logic to 
validate your point, if I can't explain to you why your logic is false then 
there's no point us talking. Just try to lay off the discrimination by 
repeatedly mentioning halal and kosher over other kinds of slaughter, I 
shouldn't have to repeat myself but they now knock the animals unconscious 
before carrying out the slaughter, just like any slaughter. Iv said my 
piece, bye.
comments.author: 13unner

comments.text:
1) "Dude I don't have time for that. Can't be bothered to even read it all"

So you're an idiot you doesn't bother knowing what you're answering to.

2) "You can find 'a video' to prove anything, so when you say 'I saw this 
video' I'm just gonna say "that's great, but can we talk statistics?""

That's an idiotic argument here. What statistics? The process of halal and 
kosher slaughters are exactly what the videos show. Every halal and kosher 
shop follows this because that IS halal and kosher.

This is an emotional appeal you idiot. You're counter argument doesn't make 
sense. This is like you arguing that waterboarding isn't torture even 
thought it's describe as torture, the US has admitted to doing it, and the 
videos show you how bad it is, because you argue the video doesn't prove 
america does it - you're missing the point.

What's your argument then? That halal ISN'T defined as slicing an animal's 
throat and letting it slowly die over 5 minutes? That's the definition of 
what it is - go see the video to see how disgusting it is and WHY you 
should be against it.

3) "STOP USING EMOTIONAL BLACKMAIL. It detracts from your point as it's not 
a respectable debating technique."

So, in other words, if someone was arguing that the jewish people didn't 
suffer much during world war 2, and I said "Seriously, just go look at one 
of the picture of how absolutely destroyed they looked after being freed." 
You'd argue that's stupid because picture tell a thousand words and prove 
that they looked bad? On the grounds that world war 2 might not have 
happened?

Find a more logically full denial.

4) ""have you seen a child get beaten to death by a cow? Beaten to death, 
bones broken sticking out of its skin, drawing a last rattling breath as 
its taken from this world by that damn cow. DEATH TO COWS!" No, that's 
stupid."

You're right ,it would be stupid, which may explain why it came out of your 
mouth instead of mine.

I'm not saying there was ONE instance of halal being bad. Halal's process 
is horrible on paper, you just see how much WORST it is when you see a 
video of it. That's the difference here. You're, again, basically arguing 
that cigs cartons shouldn't have pictures of people who got sick from cigs 
on them because that's emotional blackmail. It is. It tells you exactly how 
hard cigs will hurt you - that part isn't made up, it's just you never see 
it. Just because it used pictures or video to get a reaction from you on 
how disgusting something is, doesn't make it wrong.

You apparently just want to live in denial though.
comments.author: GADefence

comments.text:
+GADefence Dude I don't have time for that. Can't be bothered to even read 
it all, so ill just reply to your first point. That was my entire point, it 
doesn't matter. You can find 'a video' to prove anything, so when you say 
'I saw this video' I'm just gonna say "that's great, but can we talk 
statistics?" And seriously man STOP USING EMOTIONAL BLACKMAIL. It detracts 
from your point as it's not a respectable debating technique. I could say 
"have you seen a child get beaten to death by a cow? Beaten to death, bones 
broken sticking out of its skin, drawing a last rattling breath as its 
taken from this world by that damn cow. DEATH TO COWS!" No, that's stupid.
comments.author: 13unner

comments.text:
1) "I can show you videos of people crying as they kill the animal, does 
that mean all slaughterers are in emotional turmoil?"

I can show you child rapists who think they care for the kids . . . ? 
What's your point? I don't give a shit what the person doing the act is 
thinking of feeling - I give a shit what the victim is when it comes to 
stopping them. The animal is getting it's throat sliced and spends 3 
minutes suffocating to death.

2) "And I repeat, why bring up Halal slaughters specifically? I'm sure in 
the dark depths of the world I could find non Halal slaughterers doing the 
same"

The difference is halal is legal - I oppose kosher on the same grounds, and 
mentioned it, as it's about the same. I also opposed the shops that act 
vicious towards fish. For all of these expect generally aquatic animals, 
killing them in those fashions is always illegal - and that's my 
distinction. Halal and kosher are LEGAL torture of animals - non-hala and 
non-kosher places that do that are fined.

The best way I can put this would be to juxtapose this with is euthanasia. 
There's two basic sides people support there - no euthanasia (I opposed 
this idea), and euthanasia. However, NO ONE supports setting someone on 
fire until they die. That option just doesn't come up, even if someone 
thinks it brings that person closer to god. Why? Senseless torture. To me, 
hala and kosher are the fire option - other then "as commanded by a person 
I cannot factually support who I think rules the universe, I have a right 
to torture these sentient being to death." I vote no, you do not have that 
privilege.

3) "End of, And you took praying as laughing? I don't think you understand 
how dangerous your attitude is."

I'm sorry but this sounds like a ringing endorsement for the killers who 
say stuff like "I thank you for the experience." They are fake-talking 
praise to a creature I do not agree with them exists. I consider it 
laughing over a dying creature - thought if you want to talk me down to 
faked-torture-worship, I guess we can meet there. Also, how am I, the one 
who says you people can't pick up straight blades and torture sentients to 
death the dangerous one?

4) "As for the video, its Daily Mail, they promote hate for Muslims through 
sly means such as attacking Halal, plus again just because one does 
something has no bearing on the whole. Seriously look at the stuff you say 
and the damage it can cause. "

No idea, I don't follow the daily mail so I have no real care what their 
agenda is - as I do not offer them general support.

They might be attacking halal meat as a "Screw you, Islam!" move. But it's 
kind of like if I figured out Hitler wanted to end cancer. I wouldn't 
change my opinion just because a (rightfully) hated person has that opinion.

Explain to me how criticizing something that no-one can really deny is 
torture (picture for two seconds if someone did this to a human and explain 
to me how that's then not torture) is causing people damage.
comments.author: GADefence

comments.text:
+GADefence I can show you videos of people crying as they kill the animal, 
does that mean all slaughterers are in emotional turmoil? No, anecdotal 
evidence is worth than nothing, because it will lead you astray. And I 
repeat, why bring up Halal slaughters specifically? I'm sure in the dark 
depths of the world I could find non Halal slaughterers doing the same, as 
I said sadism is sadism. End of, And you took praying as laughing? I don't 
think you understand how dangerous your attitude is.

As for the video, its Daily Mail, they promote hate for Muslims through sly 
means such as attacking Halal, plus again just because one does something 
has no bearing on the whole. Seriously look at the stuff you say and the 
damage it can cause.
comments.author: 13unner

comments.text:
+13unner
The issue here is we have multiple videos of them doing it. The laughing 
part is my atheistic take on standing over it and "praying". The hosting it 
up on a leg is a specific practice - kosher, I think. The kicking blood in 
the face was a few videos I saw, and I think it part of the halal process.

I have also heard SOME arguments from imams or some such in the muslim 
community that it CAN be considered halal if it was knocked out before, but 
it seems most halal and kosher places still uphold the slaugther thing. Of 
course, all of them tell you it's human, until someone sneaks a video in.

http://www.dailymail.co.uk/news/article-2603360/Horror-halal-slaughterhouse-Shocking-undercover-film-shows-needless-suffering-livestock-butchered-without-stunned-first.html 
Showing the practice, and you can youtube halal is evil (just an easy way 
to find the video), the first one and I believe the second one are both no 
comment videos of the slaughters. It's hideous.
comments.author: GADefence

comments.text:
Almost all halal slaughters now knock the animal unconscious prior, using 
the same method as non-halal. After that point you really start to worry 
me... 'While people laugh at it and/or hoist it up by a leg [while] in pain 
and/or kick blood in it's face' These are cases of sadism that is totally 
unlinked to halal. There is no need for it in halal and hence it 'can' be 
the case with all slaughters. That being said (bearing in mind I have never 
worked in a slaughterhouse, and probably have the same amount of background 
knowledge as you on the matter) I highly doubt that is regularly the case, 
certainly not enough to label all slaughterers as sadists. Ultimately it 
seems that you are trying to argue your point through emotional blackmail 
and misinformation, and the ends never justify the means which ever side of 
the fence you stand on.

it indeed fact that the Chinese then had the heavily irradiated Bonobo 
/Human hybrids installed into the Australian political system? The truth is 
out there.﻿
